review.description: Food is OK. Hazelnut coffee and palmier is great. Unfortunately no place to charge my phone. This place has place to sit down and eat.
review.author: Vlad V.

review.description:
Location is good

The price is OK

The food is MEH

Had coffee - they had no milk

Had a salad -  someone un experinced was making it.

Just meh - just dont have high hopes
review.author: Michael J.

review.description: this place is always packed!!,however i don't mind the wait if quanton is there!! from the first day i walked in he was my cashier someone was asking silly questions he took in stride . so i started singing go quanton its ur birtday making a joke. he knows his work and is super friendly. he is by far my favorite there he knows whats in my box or bag he just have to count them lol
review.author: Tazz F.

review.description: Ew. The service was good, which is all I can really say good about the place. I was only able to swallow two bites of my nasty BBQ Chicken sandwich, and what I thought would be a harmless yogurt, put me in the bathroom several times today if you know what I mean. Au Bon Pain-in-My-Ass for real.
review.author: Amuse B.

review.description: blah. extremely unsantariy the day we visited , all the tables were dirty and the floor.
review.author: Chichi P.

review.description: I am 9 month pregnant and I had a difficulty in breathing the other day.  Stuffs are very nice and the manager kindly called my husband and gave me juice and water.  I and my husband are really appreciated and we will keep using this Au Bon Pain! Thanks!!!
review.author: Hiroko Y.
